resources.string: Emperor\'s App
Please enable all permissions
Loyal subject,
You are proceeding in my exhibition.
Please check wifi settings

The contents in this app can only be unlocked in the exhibition 'The Emperor's New Saint'. Unless you are already in Stift Klosterneuburg, get on the road from 9th of March to 17th of November.

In order to use all functions of this app, please switch to the wifi 'DesKaisersNeuerHeiliger' 
(password 'maximilian').
Bluetooth is off
With Bluetooth, we want to detect which exhibit is the closest to your position.\n\nPlease turn on your bluetooth.
Settings
Cancel
Confirm
Open the app to get to know more about me and my exhibits.
A new version is available for \'Emperor\'s App\'. Please update!
Update
Go to App Store

Invalid Key used. Please make sure you are using a valid Vuforia Engine App Key.
